attributes.action: Safer Schools, primary and high schools
attributes.additional_details: The safety of children and educational staff must remain a top priority, and I believe more can be done to support schools in protecting against potential threats.
attributes.background:
Increased funding for school security systems (CCTV, secure entrances, panic alarms).

Mandatory terrorism response drills and staff training in every school.

Stronger coordination between schools and local police forces.

A review of current policies on emergency preparedness in schools.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund security guards and CCTV on school premises & introduce new protocols
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738547
